title: Isn't as good as...
review: The story carries on from the first, which I was happy about seeing it goes more into the lady in black storyline.It tries to be like the first instalment which I do enjoy but wasn't as good.Good sequel after a better than great start of the series.A must if you liked the first.

title: One of the good ones...
review: I've only recently watch this movie knowing about it since release but only had time recently.What can I say? Definitely worth the watch, the movie was filmed near perfectly, loved the atmosphere, the actors all did their part.A must if a horror fan...
